    • Constructor Detail

      • MqttConnection

        public MqttConnection​(java.lang.String hostname,
                      java.lang.String clientId,
                      java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      javax.net.ssl.SSLContext sslContext,
                      MqttListener listener,
                      boolean useWebSockets)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor to create MqttAsync Client with Paho
        Parameters:
        hostname - Uri to connect to
        clientId - Client Id to connect to
        userName - Username
        password - password
        sslContext - SSLContext for the connection
        listener - Mqtt listener
        useWebSockets - true to use Mqtt over web sockets
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if any of the parameters are null or empty or client cannot be instantiated
